metadata.name: MKVLI #1/1000
metadata.description:
In the year 2021, the Federal Reserve announced its intention to launch an inquiry into creating a CBDC.

A report was expected, detailing a proposed design and implementation of the coin.

Despite the passing of time, the report remains elusive. Its contents unknown to us, the people.

We are MKVLI - organizing to Prevent Unilateral Control of a U.S. Digital Currency.

On a dark path, one similar to the digital authoritarianism of China, we must ensure that any currency implemented in our land is open, permissionless, private, accessible and respectful to all that is enshrined in the traditions of our people.

This is the chance to inscribed ourselves ahead of the battle. To be remembered as the warriors of freedom.
